data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 15,310 believers in Gandhinagar to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gandhinagar, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Gandhinagar, Gujarat, India a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Gandhinagar.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,391,800 people living in Gandhinagar, Gujarat, India. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Molvi people. Make the Molvi people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Gandhinagar that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Gandhinagar, Gujarat, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Gandhinagar.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.
